scenes.action: [00:00-00:02] Wide shot of Kaelen, their electric blue undercut damp from the heavy rain, as they step into the mouth of the Neon Alleyway, boots splashing in a shallow digital puddle.
[00:02-00:04] Close-up profile of Kaelen's face, cybernetic silver eyes narrow as they scan a flickering holographic advertisement, neon pink light reflecting off their wet skin.
[00:04-00:06] Low-angle tracking shot following Kaelen's arm; the neon glowing tattoos on their forearms pulse with a soft cyan light as they pull up their hoodie's collar.
[00:06-00:08] Wide, high-angle crane shot showing Kaelen standing alone beneath a massive, buzzing neon billboard that casts long, distorted shadows across the wet pavement.
